1.title: Dickly Speaking

episode of.title: The Adventures of Longblack and Fast Eddie (TV Series 2014â€“ )

1.plot: A former rap star and a wanna be rapper move in together, when this somewhat 'odd' couple soon discovers that living with each other is more of an adventure than re-discovering fame or finding it.

imdb.plot outline: In the spring of 2014, a one hit rap music icon (Longblack aka 'LBC') from Longbeach California finally realizes that small time free flow sessions at Venice Beach won't bring him back the fame that he remembers. He meets and teams up with a skater, and would-be rapper (Eddie 'Fast Eddie' Emerson) from Boston Massachussetts for mutual benefit. Fast Eddie is one of Longblack's biggest fans, and after meeting him decides that he wants to be trained by Longblack on becoming a rapper. Longblack has only one objective, and that is to return to the life of girls, drugs and rap stardom that he remembers. The two of them soon discover that finding or re-discovering stardom can be a huge challenge for them.
imdb.title: The Adventures of Longblack and Fast Eddie
akas: The Adventures of Longblack and Fast Eddie (United States)
plot: In the spring of 2014, a one hit rap music icon (Longblack aka 'LBC') from Longbeach California finally realizes that small time free flow sessions at Venice Beach won't bring him back the fame that he remembers. He meets and teams up with a skater, and would-be rapper (Eddie 'Fast Eddie' Emerson) from Boston Massachussetts for mutual benefit. Fast Eddie is one of Longblack's biggest fans, and after meeting him decides that he wants to be trained by Longblack on becoming a rapper. Longblack has only one objective, and that is to return to the life of girls, drugs and rap stardom that he remembers. The two of them soon discover that finding or re-discovering stardom can be a huge challenge for them.::C. Pickett
